name: Toe Jam & Earl
description:
Toe Jam and Earl are two fun-loving aliens who accidentally crash on
Earth when their spaceship collides with a meteorite! They must find 10
pieces of the spaceship so they can get back home to Planet Funkotron,
but not all levels have the pieces. If there's a piece in a level, you
will receive a hint as soon as you arrive.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
